footnotes: Hawa wenye kusifiwa hivi ndio watakao rithi kheri yote na wataipata Siku ya Kiyama. Hawa ndio Mwenyezi Mungu atawafadhili kwa kuwapa Firdausi, ndio pahala pa juu kabisa huko Peponi, wastarehe humo peke yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
